item.title: 花旗首席执行官弗雷泽就房利美和房地美公开募股问题会见特朗普
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）周三会见了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普，就抵押贷款巨头房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）公开发行股票一事进行了推介。【原文：Citigroup Inc. Chief Executive Officer Jane Fraser met with President Donald Trump on Wednesday to pitch public stock offerings for mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.】

item.title: Blackstone 向私人信贷寻求 30 亿美元 Enverus 贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正与一组私人信用贷款机构商讨约 30 亿美元的债务，以支持其收购能源数据平台 Enverus Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc. is in discussions with a group of private credit lenders for approximately $3 billion of debt to support its acquisition of energy data platform Enverus Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 巨灾相关损失下降，AIG 盈利超出预期
item.description: 美国国际集团公司（American International Group Inc.【原文：American International Group Inc. reported second-quarter results that beat Wall Street expectations, helped by a sharp drop in catastrophe-related losses and higher investment gains.】

item.title: 尽管房市低迷，Zillow 盈利仍超出预期
item.description: Zillow Group Inc. 公布的第二季度业绩超过了分析师的预期，这家房地产公司在充满挑战的美国房地产市场中游刃有余。【原文：Zillow Group Inc. reported second-quarter results that beat analysts’ estimates as the real estate company navigated the challenging US housing market.】

item.title: 美联储主席戴利称 "未来数月 "可能需要调整利率
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，决策者可能需要在未来几个月调整利率，以防止劳动力市场进一步疲软。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said policymakers will probably need to adjust interest rates in coming months to prevent further weakness in the labor market.】

item.title: 外卖订单创纪录，DoorDash 前景看好
item.description: 美国最大的食品外卖服务公司 DoorDash 公司发布的第三季度订单展望超出了华尔街的预期，这表明尽管人们对消费支出存在更广泛的担忧，但对其服务的需求仍有韧性。【原文：DoorDash Inc., the largest food delivery service in the US, issued an outlook for orders in the third quarter that surpassed Wall Street’s expectations, a sign that demand for its services remains resilient despite broader concerns about consumer spending.】

item.title: Lyft 第二季度业绩超出预期，乘车次数创历史新高
item.description: Lyft Inc. 周三尾盘股价下滑，此前该打车公司公布的营收低于华尔街预期，引发了市场对其全球扩张努力的担忧。【原文：Lyft Inc. shares slid in late Wednesday trading after the ride-hailing company reported revenue that fell short of Wall Street’s expectations, stoking concerns about its efforts to expand globally.】

item.title: Airbnb 发布温和的夏季展望，警告增长速度可能跟不上
item.description: Airbnb Inc. 发布的第三季度业绩展望好于预期，因为该公司看到了令人鼓舞的夏季旅游需求，但该公司警告说，由于去年同期比较困难，今年下半年的增长率可能跟不上。【原文：Airbnb Inc. issued a better-than-expected outlook for the third quarter as it saw encouraging summer travel demand, but warned that growth rates may not keep up later this year due to tough year-ago comparisons.】

item.title: 播客的 "连续剧 "时代终结，视频接管一切
item.description:
随着以视频为中心的播客的兴起，该行业将迎来新一轮的系列和交易浪潮。与此同时，传统音频系列剧的制作者们却很受伤。【原文：

With the rise of video-centric podcasting, the industry is poised to usher in a new wave of series and deals. Meanwhile, makers of traditional audio series are hurting. 

】

item.title: 半导体关税临近，特朗普会见英伟达黄晓明
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三在白宫会见了英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在白宫举行会谈。【原文：US President Donald Trump met Wednesday with Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang at the White House, as he readies sweeping new tariffs on semiconductor imports.】

item.title: 黑客利用鬼鬼祟祟的恶意软件工具窃取英国国家医疗服务系统（NHS）密码
item.description: 2022年12月20日星期二，停在英国利物浦皇家利物浦大学医院急诊室外的救护车。护士、救护车司机、边防部队以及邮政、铁路和公共汽车工人都将在本周举行罢工，因为他们将在生活费用危机中与雇主展开斗争。摄影师Anthony Devlin/Bloomberg【原文：Ambulances parked outside the Emergency Department at the Royal Liverpool University Hospital in Liverpool, UK, on Tuesday, Dec. 20, 2022. Nurses, ambulance drivers, the border force and postal, rail and bus workers are all set to walk out this week as they battle with employers amid the cost-of-living crisis. Photographer: Anthony Devlin/Bloomberg】

item.title: 黑客利用鬼鬼祟祟的恶意软件工具窃取英国国家医疗服务系统（NHS）密码
item.description: 据研究人员称，黑客窃取了数千名英国国民健康服务机构工作人员的登录凭证，使该机构面临进一步遭受网络攻击的风险。【原文：Hackers have stolen login credentials from thousands of people working with the UK’s National Health Service, putting the organization at risk of further cyberattacks, according to researchers.】

item.title: 巴西总统在路透社采访中排除了对美国征收互惠关税的可能性
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）在接受路透社采访时表示，针对唐纳德-特朗普对巴西商品征收50%的贸易关税，巴西不会针对美国征收对等关税。【原文：Brazil will not target the US with reciprocal tariffs in response to the 50% trade levies Donald Trump placed on its goods, President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 特朗普关税战略的意外后果
item.description:
在本期特朗普经济学节目中，我们将讨论美元、失业和1万亿美元的豁免权如何给全球贸易战的未来蒙上阴影。【原文：

On this episode of Trumponomics, we discuss how the dollar, unemployment and a $1 trillion in exemptions are clouding the future of the global trade war. 

】

item.title: DeepSeek 和开源模型如何颠覆人工智能
item.description: 长期以来，科技公司和学术界一直在纠结构建开源软件的风险和回报。但是，围绕生成式人工智能的热潮为这场争论赋予了新的意义。【原文：Tech companies and academics have long wrestled with the risks and rewards of building open-source software. But the frenzy around generative artificial intelligence has lent new significance to the debate.】

item.title: 瑞银策略师称美元负面故事 "重出江湖
item.description: 瑞银集团旗下一家机构的策略师表示，美国劳动力市场疲软以及美联储理事会和劳工统计局的变动是可能推动美元和国债走低的风险因素。【原文：Weakness in the US labor market and changes to the Federal Reserve’s board and Bureau of Labor Statistics are risks that could push the dollar and Treasuries lower, strategists at a unit of UBS Group said.】

item.title: 墨西哥石油公司（Pemex）东山再起计划缺乏分析师所要求的运营改革
item.description: 据分析师称，墨西哥石油公司的扭亏计划未能解决困扰这家石油钻探商的最大运营挑战。【原文：Mexico’s turnaround plan for Petroleos Mexicanos fails to address the biggest operational challenges plaguing the oil driller, according to analysts.】

item.title: 滞胀比你想象的要近得多
item.description: 美联储正陷入困境。在上周五令人震惊的疲软就业数据之后，在通胀率顽固地高于趋势的情况下，央行的最大就业和物价稳定的双重任务显然都偏离了方向，并且朝着相反的方向发展。美联储该怎么办？【原文：The Federal Reserve is in a bind. After shockingly weak jobs data on Friday — and with inflation stubbornly above trend — it’s becoming clear that the central bank’s dual mandates of maximum employment and price stability are both offsides and pulling in opposite directions. What should the Fed do?】

item.title: 国米利润大增，BTG 升级，两年来涨幅最大
item.description: Inter & Co.股价创下两年来最大涨幅，此前这家巴西贷款公司报告利润大增，BTG Pactual SA 银行也上调了该股的评级。【原文：Inter & Co. shares jumped the most in two years after the Brazilian lender reported a profit jump and Banco BTG Pactual SA upgraded the stock.】

item.title: 美联储库克称就业数据显示经济出现 "转折点
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克称 7 月份的就业报告 "令人担忧"，并表示这可能预示着美国经济将出现拐点。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook called the July jobs report “concerning,” and said it could signal an inflection point for the US economy.】

item.title: 高盛称美国收益率曲线形状看起来像零利率时代
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的利率策略师表示，除非美联储将利率降至零，否则五年内到期的美国国债相对于其他期限的国债很少如此昂贵。【原文：US Treasury debt maturing in five years has rarely been this expensive relative to other maturities except when the Federal Reserve has dropped interest rates to zero, according to interest-rate strategists at Goldman Sachs.】

item.title: 特朗普盟友卢默将波多黎各破产之战拖入极右派聚光灯下
item.description: 劳拉-卢默（Laura Loomer）几个月来一直在攻击从塔克-卡尔森（Tucker Carlson）到白宫记录办公室主任的一切人和事，她在 X 上获得了 170 多万名粉丝，同时也提升了她对唐纳德-特朗普总统的影响力。【原文：Laura Loomer has spent months attacking everything from Tucker Carlson to the head of the White House records’ office, gaining a following of more than 1.7 million on X while ratcheting up her influence with President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 10 年期国债拍卖需求疲软，美国国债收益率上升
item.description: 国债收益率走高，此前对新 10 年期国债拍卖的需求疲软，凸显了投资者对近期涨势能否持续的担忧。【原文：Treasury yields edged higher after weak demand for an auction of new 10-year notes highlighted investor anxiety about whether recent gains are sustainable.】

item.title: 亚马逊 Zoox 无人驾驶汽车获得美国监管机构许可
item.description: 特朗普政府为亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）的自动驾驶汽车子公司 Zoox 演示缺乏方向盘等传统驾驶控制装置的自动驾驶汽车扫清了障碍。【原文：The Trump administration has cleared the way for Zoox, the autonomous-vehicle subsidiary of Amazon.com Inc., to demonstrate self-driving cars that lack traditional driving controls like steering wheels.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会起诉阻止 Edwards LifeSciences 医疗器械交易
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周三提起诉讼，阻止爱德华生命科学公司（Edwards Lifesciences Corp.【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission filed suit Wednesday to block Edwards Lifesciences Corp. from acquiring medical device maker JenaValve Technology Inc.】

item.title: 德克萨斯州养老基金任命前阿波罗公司总裁 Annika Kim 为信贷总监
item.description: 德克萨斯州市政退休系统已聘请阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：The Texas Municipal Retirement System has hired Annika Kim, a former private equity employee at Apollo Global Management Inc. as the fund’s new credit director.】

item.title: 尼日利亚维持一年期国债的高收益率以吸引投资者
item.description: 尼日利亚央行在周二的拍卖会上维持了海外投资者青睐的一年期票据两位数的高收益率，以维持美元流入并支撑奈拉。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank retained high double-digit yields on one-year papers favored by offshore investors in an auction on Tuesday to sustain dollar inflows and shore up the naira.】

item.title: 加拿大卫星公司 Telesat 愿意为特朗普的金顶计划提供帮助
item.description: 加拿大最大的卫星公司 Telesat 公司表示，它可以为唐纳德-特朗普总统所谓的 "金圆顶 "导弹防御系统提供帮助。【原文：Telesat Corp., Canada’s biggest satellite company, said it can help President Donald Trump’s so-called Golden Dome missile defense system.】

item.title: 玉米跌破每蒲式耳 4 美元，美国丰产成为焦点
item.description: 玉米期货跌破每蒲式耳 4 美元，跌至约 11 个月以来的最低水平，原因是在下周将公布一份可能显示惊人产量的关键报告之前，美国的良好天气继续对价格构成压力。【原文：Corn futures fell below $4 a bushel to the lowest level in about 11 months as favorable US weather continued to weigh on prices ahead of a key report due next week that could show eye-popping yields.】

item.title: 龙卷风现金》联合创始人斯托姆在加密货币混合案中被判有罪
item.description: 龙卷风现金公司（Tornado Cash）的一名联合创始人被判犯有共谋经营无照资金转移业务罪，检察官称，该公司通过加密平台洗钱超过 10 亿美元，此案受到密切关注，对开源开发和区块链隐私产生了深远影响。【原文：A co-founder of Tornado Cash was convicted of conspiring to run an unlicensed money-transfer operation that prosecutors said laundered more than $1 billion through the crypto platform in a closely watched case with sweeping implications for open-source development and blockchain privacy.】
